name: Aschenwald Gerhard
description:
Our one familyhouse is in quiet, sunny and central position in Ramsau.
The apartement is 70m² and there is a big kitchen, 2 big sleeping rooms with 3 and 4 sleeping possiblilities. In the bathroom is a shower, a bath, WC and a seperate WC.
There are some possibilities to go hiking in summer,to to skiing or cross-country skiing in winter.
The cross-country skiing course is direktly next to the house.
The skibus is accessible by foot at 3 minutes. 

Beautyful ski areas are:
- in Zell am Ziller - Ski Arena (3 km away), which is associatet with Gerlos
- in Schwendau - Zillertal 3000 (2 km away), Horberg, Penken
- in Mayrhofen - Ahorn (4 km away)
- Tux - Hintertuxer Gletscher (20 km away)
- and many other ski areas in the vicinity of 10 km

In the evening you can make a toboggan evening on the longes toboggan run (7 km long) from the Gerlossteinbahn Hainzenberg. For this the gondola drives daily from 07:00pm to 09:15pm.
In Summer you can go up the mountain with the ramsauer chairlift, where you can make beautyful hiking tours.
Also a great destination is the Zillertaler Höhenstraße, where you have a wonderful panorama of the zillervalley.
The swimmingpool is 10 minutes away.
On bad wetter you can visit the indoor pool in Mayrhofen (4 km  away) or the thermal bath in Fügen (15 km away).
Our area is one of the best to go paragliding, hang-gliding or mountainbiking.
We also have many via ferrata in the area, as well as the breath-taking flying fox in Gerlosstein.
The area has some special and varied activities for everybody to offer.
We are glad to be allowed to welcome you soon with ourselves.

Anita and Gerhard Aschenwald
Arrival is possible every day, arrivaltime 24 h
